original: “Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, aññaṁ ekasaṁyojanampi samanupassāmi yena saṁyojanena saṁyuttā sattā dīgharattaṁ sandhāvanti saṁsaranti yathayidaṁ, bhikkhave, taṇhāsaṁyojanaṁ.
analyzed: ▁nāhaṃ ▁bhikkhave ▁aññaṃ ▁eka saṃ yojan ampi ▁samanupass āmi ▁yena ▁saṃyojan ena ▁saṃ yuttā ▁sattā ▁dīgharattaṃ ▁sandh āva nti ▁saṃsar anti ▁yath ayi d aṃ ▁bhikkhave ▁taṇhā saṃ yojan aṃ

original: Taṇhāsaṁyojanena hi, bhikkhave, saṁyuttā sattā dīgharattaṁ sandhāvanti saṁsarantī”ti.
analyzed: ▁taṇhā saṃ yojan ena ▁hi ▁bhikkhave ▁saṃ yuttā ▁sattā ▁dīgharattaṃ ▁sandh āva nti ▁saṃsar antīti
▁et amā d ī na v aṃ ▁ñatvā

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
